description: Based upon courses from participating departments, the seminar introduces students to the
historical and cross-cultural experiences of Africans and African Americans.  It affords students
the chance to engage in interdisciplinary interpretation and analysis and encourages them to
interpret their own heritage in light of the African/African American experience.  This course
emphasizes literary texts. Counts toward ARMS and American Studies majors
fullname: Africa and the Americas: The Diaspora Experience
